meanings.definition: A heavy cotton fabric with a thick nap resembling moleskin.
meanings.sent1: She wore a warm jacket made of moleskin during the chilly evening.
meanings.sent2: The moleskin fabric felt soft against her skin as she wrapped herself in it.
meanings.sent3: The moleskin fabric was so cozy that even the cat wanted to snuggle in it.
meanings.sent4: The moleskin material hugged her like a gentle bear, providing comfort.
meanings.sent5: The moleskin fabric was like a fluffy cloud, inviting and comforting.

meanings.definition: A soft, thick, usually cotton fabric with a suede-like finish.
meanings.sent1: He bought a pair of gloves made of moleskin to keep his hands warm.
meanings.sent2: The moleskin fabric of her dress felt luxurious against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The moleskin fabric whispered secrets of comfort to anyone who touched it.
meanings.sent4: Her moleskin scarf wrapped around her neck like a gentle hug.
meanings.sent5: The moleskin fabric was a soft cloud embracing her with warmth.

meanings.definition: A notebook with a cover made of moleskin fabric.
meanings.sent1: She carried her important notes in a moleskin notebook wherever she went.
meanings.sent2: The moleskin cover of the notebook had a velvety feel under her fingers.
meanings.sent3: The moleskin notebook was her trusted companion in all her adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts flowed freely on the pages of the moleskin notebook.
meanings.sent5: The moleskin notebook held her dreams like a precious treasure chest.
